name: Clean Shot
help:
Delivers an attack to target.
Combo Action: Slug Shot or Heated Slug Shot
Combo Potency: 1,250
Gauss Barrel Effect: Increases Heat Gauge by 5

※Action changes to Heated Clean Shot when executed while a Gauss Barrel is attached and the Heat Gauge is 50 or higher.
※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
